info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McDowell, north central Rutherford and southwestern Burke Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marion, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Old Fort, Sugar Hill, Thermal City, Pleasant Gardens, Glenwood, Fero, Dysartsville and Union Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
